title: Codette v2 AI Assistant
subtitle: Neuro-symbolic modular AI assistant with CLI, API, and test runner.
description:
This bundle includes:
- codette.zip: pip-installable Codette AI package
- codette_cli.py: command-line interface
- codette_api.py: RESTful FastAPI server
- codette_test_runner.py: test automation script

Use this with the provided `codette_kaggle_demo.ipynb` notebook to test Codette's reasoning engine.
